arraySorter

Class BubbleSortTimer<T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • arraySorter.BubbleSort<T>
      • arraySorter.BubbleSortTimer<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of object sorted by the bubble sort to be timed.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArraySort<T>, Timer
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CharacterBubbleSortTimer, IntegerBubbleSortTimer

    public abstract class BubbleSortTimer<T extends java.lang.Comparable<? super T>>
extends BubbleSort<T>
implements Timer
    Base implementation for bubble sort timers.
    Version:
    October 2019
    Author:
    Hugh Osborne
